sense.def:
To go out of a place
ali
to get out of something
pomeni zapustiti kraj ali nekaj, na primer vozilo, tako da nismo več v njem.

seg.quote: She rushed out of the house.
She's just got out of bed.

sense.def:
Kdor je
out
, ni doma ali na običajnem delovnem mestu.

seg.quote: He came when I was out.
Joe is out looking for her.

sense.def:
To look out of a window
pomeni pogledati skozi okno stvari, ki so zunaj.

seg.quote: She stared out at the rain.
I was standing looking out over the view.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
out
povemo, da se nekaj ne dogaja v notranjosti kake stavbe, ampak zunaj nje.

seg.quote: Many people were sleeping out.
It's hot out.

sense.def:
To take something out of a container or place
pomeni odstraniti nekaj iz posode ali kraja.

seg.quote: She opened a box and took out a cigarette.
He got out a book and read.

sense.def:
To keep someone or something out of a place
pomeni onemogočiti osebi ali stvari vstop.

seg.quote: It's designed to keep out intruders.

sense.def:
Kadar je luč ali ogenj
out
, ne gori več.

seg.quote: The lights went out.
He helped to put the fire out.

sense.def:
Kadar so cvetlice
out
, se njihovi cvetni listi razprejo.

seg.quote: The daffodils were out.
The men stayed out for nearly a month.
That's right out, I'm afraid.
Romance is making a comeback. Reality is out.

sense.def:
Kadar morje ali plima
goes out
, se voda odmika od obale.

Kadar je izračun ali meritev
out
, ni pravilna.

seg.quote: It's only a couple of degrees out.

sense.def:
To be out to do something
pomeni, da nekdo namerava nekaj narediti;

seg.quote: They're out to use your house as a free hotel.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
out of
uvedemo razlog, zaradi katerega človek nekaj stori. Na primer, če nekaj naredimo
out of pity
, tisto naredimo zato, ker se nam nekdo smili.

seg.quote: He wrote that review out of pure spite.

sense.def:
Če zadovoljstvo ali prednost črpamo
out of something
, jo črpamo iz tistega.

To be out of something
pomeni ne več imeti nečesa.

seg.quote: We're out of paper.

sense.def:
To make something out of a particular material
pomeni, da pri izdelavi nečesa uporabimo ta material.

seg.quote: You can make petroleum out of coal.
